QuestData.Title: WANTED: The Rime Huntress
QuestData.Description:
Attention Interested Parties! A Moneymaking Opportunity Awaits!!!!!
There's a big wolf hunting people in the pass. She's taken a liking to the taste of goblin. Nobody got time for being eaten by a wolf, so take out the Rime Huntress and I'll pay you for your trouble.
- Suzie Boltwrench
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A ferocious wolf that terrorizes traders traveling through Highroad Pass.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat The Rime Huntress near Highroad Pass.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Suzie Boltwrench at Krazzlefrazz Outpost.
